doc.summary: A class used in the drops method to reduce ambiguity and make the code more readable.
doc.text: A class used in the drops method to reduce ambiguity and make the code more readable. Just call  the <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/data/provider/BlockLootProviderBase" method="silk" type="(io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider.BlockLootProviderBase.GenericLootModifier)io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider.BlockLootProviderBase.SilkModifier">#silk(GenericLootModifier)</ref> method wih a generic loot modifier to get a silk modifier.  A silk modifier does not extend <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/data/provider/BlockLootProviderBase$GenericLootModifier">GenericLootModifier</ref> for this reason.
